This account has been set up a custom account, you can only set once This account has been found, please enter a different account Initialization failed, please check the network settings Encryption module failed to initialize, Please try again later Authorization failed Please check whether the security chip and Actoma+ version match Error but no message, please submit the error log. Send verification code SMS Send Resend(%1$d) Resend You will be authorized %1$s to log in to the device %2$s. %1$sAfter login, the account will automatically log out from the device. Are you sure you want to delete this device? After deleting the device, to log in to the device again, you need to authorize the trusted device for the account. If you do not have any trusted devices after deletion, this account may not be able to log on. Modify Device Name Please enter the device name The device name can not be greater than 32 characters Confirm the original equipment is lost? The original device is not in the side, do not perform this operation. After logging in as an authenticated account, the account is bound to the new device, and all authorized devices can not log in to the account. Password Account or password can not be empty The mobile phone has been bound to other Actoma+ account. The phone has been bound to other Actoma+ account, if bound to this account, the original account will be released binding relationship. Authorized serial number: If you can not scan, use the original device. You can verify the identity by following the login. However, due to the failure to withstand the letter of authorization, key data may not be able to restore the original device, and offline messages will not be able to decrypt. To reset the password need to verify identity, you can choose the following ways:

This phone number has been bound to the other Actoma+ account This phone number has been bound to the other Actoma+ account, if you bind this account, the original account will be released binding relationship. Bind this account
Bound Phone Number: Change the Phone Number After the replacement of the phone number, the next login or retrieve the password can be used a new phone number, the original phone number will be tied. Phone Number Unbundling Determine unbundled phone number?？ Unbind phone number, you will not be able to login by phone verification code. W
Authorize other devices to log on to the account (for the first time). Mode 1: Enter the serial number generated when other devices log in for the first time Mode 2: Scan the QR code generated by the first login of other devices Serial

Actoma+ account can only be set once, after setting the original Actoma account will be invalid. Actoma+ account is composed of 6~20 letters beginning with the letters, numbers, underline and minus sign.
1~16 characters Nicknames only support 1–16 characters Take a name for your own personality~

Account & Security Third Encryption Services About Actoma+ About Chip Chat & Call Notifications Do Not Disturb Log Out Logging out without delete historical data. Close Actoma+ Close the application and not exit the current account. Close Account:

Search Group Chat Add Friends Scan QR Code Settings
Special Note Welcome to use Actoma+ client software, Actoma+ is a social applications that developed, owned, and operated by Zhengzhou XDJA technology Ltd..Actoma+ client will generate traffic fees during use, traffic fee please consult the local operators;To protect user privacy is a basic policy of Actoma; Actoma client will collect the user\'s SMS,photo album and other basic information during use.\n Actoma+ client will need the following permissions during use: read the phone status and identity, directly call the phone number, read your message (SMS or MMS), receive messages (SMS),take photos and video, audio, read your USB storage device, modify, and delete the content of your USB storage device, disable lock screen, check the content of the network connection, check the WLAN connection,connecting WLAN network and disconnection, full network access, paired with a bluetooth device, shut down other applications, retrieval of the running application, startup, on other applications to display content, prevent cell phone dormancy, vibration control,modify your audio settings, send persistent broadcasts, and modify system settings. Agree Close 0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ-_
